Module nl.naturalis.common

Package nl.naturalis.common

Contains various static method utility classes for working with strings, arrays, collections, etc.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Emptyable
    Defines objects that can meaningfully be said to be empty, e.g. when all their fields are null.
    Sizeable
    Defines objects that can meaningfully be said to have a certain size or length.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ArrayMethods
    Methods for working with arrays.
    ClassMethods
    Methods for inspecting types.
    CollectionMethods
    Methods extending the Java Collection framework.
    ExceptionMethods
    Methods related to exception handling.
    FunctionalMethods
    Methods assisting in functional programming
    IOMethods
    I/O-related methods.
    NumberMethods
    Methods for working with Number instances.
    ObjectMethods
    General methods applicable to objects of any type.
    OptionalMethods
    Methods for working with java.util.Optional objects.
    StringMethods
    Methods for working with strings.
    Tuple<LEFT,​RIGHT>
    Generic, immutable Tuple class.
